group_1.textRight: Wow… I've never been to@a beach like this before…

group_1.textLeft: The water…it's so clear!
Is the water more clouded@where you're from?

group_1.textRight: Yes, but it's still similar.
So this is Nagitsu, right?@Is there a lot of fishing here?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, rather than rice cultivation,@fishing is the dominant industry in this area.
If there are any Demons here,@I'd like to defeat them posthaste.
And it looks like they ARE here…

group_1.textRight: But the trace is kind of weak…

group_1.textLeft: Let's split up and check@the surrounding area.

group_1.textRight: No way! We're your guards!

group_1.textLeft: I bet you're simply worried about@getting lost in a new area.
Well, try not to lose your way@as we follow the trail.

group_1.textRight: Princess Tsuyu is a bit of@a tomboy, isn't she…
Perhaps she simply lacks@a sense of danger.

group_1.textLeft: When I first became a Magical Girl,@I was pretty reckless too.

group_1.textCenter: I can sense its presence around here…
It's close…but I'm getting another signal too…?

group_1.textLeft: Hey! Who the hell are you?!

group_1.textRight: A girl…?
There was a rumor about strange voices@coming from the beach.
I thought it might be a Demon,@so I came to check it out.

group_1.narration: ―Tsuyu―@The famine ravaging this land is the work of Demons.@Please leave for your own safety!
―Chizuru―@If you can't recognize the Battle Shamaness of the East,@then I guess the West's Battle Shamaness isn't as good as I thought!
―Chizuru―@Well, sorry, but I'm the one taking the win here,@so you can scram.
―Tsuyu―@We're both aware of the devastation happening to the people.@We should join forces to help them!

group_1.textLeft: You want to team up with me,@even though I'm with Taito?

group_1.textRight: You're a part of Taito?!
If I had known that beforehand, I never@would've asked to partner with you!

group_1.textLeft: Hey, hey, hey, talk about showing your@true colors once you knew who I was.

group_1.textRight: I would never trust someone who manipulated@Demons into causing the famine!

group_1.textLeft: Huh? Manipulating Demons?
Are you delusional or something?@No one would be able to do that!

group_1.textRight: You came here to unleash a horrible@Demon, didn't you?!

group_1.textLeft: I just came to check on the West@and lend aid if they needed it!
I don't get why you hate Taito, but we both@want to protect the people, right?

group_1.textRight: …How dare you act like a hero,@when you're the cause of all this suffering!
The Taito Gang are a bunch of@maniacal ruffians!

group_1.textLeft: …What a pain in the ass…
I guess you really have forgotten@all about it.
My father told me that the Mizuna@were heartless people.
Looks like he was right.

group_1.textRight: You won't get away with this!

group_1.textLeft: And what are you gonna do about it? Don't@underestimate me just because I'm younger, okay?

group_1.textRight: I'm going to defeat that Demon, and then@you'll have to apologize to the people.

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh*
If a fight's what you want,@then that's what you'll get!
Wait, what's happening?!

group_1.textRight: I hear something…

group_1.textLeft: A voice… Who is this?!

group_1.textRight: Quiet, she's trying to say something…

group_1.narration: "You and I come from different@places and different positions.@Our relationship could never be accepted here."
"But despite my sorrow, I refuse to hold@any resentment against my clan.@I want to change this village so@that everyone can live freely and happily."
"So if you're still alive, please remember me,@because I'm still waiting for you..."

group_1.textLeft: It's gone now…
The voice came from this seashell…

group_1.textRight: "We come from different places, but…"

group_1.textLeft: Why are you repeating it like that was@some sign from the heavens?
This is too weird, my mood's been spoiled…
I'm bored, so I'm going home.

group_1.textCenter: My name is Tsuyu Mizuna, daughter of@Lord Masatsuna Mizuna!

group_1.textLeft: And I'm Chizuru, daughter of Saemon Banshu,@head of the Taito Gang!
